name: market for indium rich leaching residues, from zinc production | indium rich leaching residues, from zinc production | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3884/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'indium rich leaching residues, from zinc production', in the Global geography. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;No transport is considered, as further processing takes place at the same site.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'indium rich leaching residues, from zinc production',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  indium rich leaching residues, from zinc production', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
